article_title: COVID-19 could kill 550 to 1,750 New Brunswickers, provincial modelling suggests
article_description: COVID 19 could kill between 550 and 1 750 New Brunswickers over the next 18 to 24 months  depending on the level of compliance with Public Health measures  until a vaccine is available  projections released by the provincial government Thursday suggest
